name: Invaders from Beyond the Stars
description: Keep your eyes on the skies! Alien invaders are here! At least those are the warnings heard throughout the Delta Quadrant after frightening tales about Voyager spread. But Voyager and her crew aren't invaders... are they?
rules:
-- In a Skirmish Event, you will engage in space battles against thematically appropriate foes until the Event's conclusion.
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- Unique Ship Battle Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Gul Evek, any version of Makull, Janeway, APU 3947, Voyager crew, or crew with matching Battle Traits, will provide a bonus.
-- Using the Warship Voyager, the U.S.S. Voyager NCC-74656-J, or the Cardassian Galor Cruiser will provide a bonus to hull.
-- Every Ship Battle you win earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Gul Evek, Makull, Janeway, APU 3947, or Voyager

featured_crew.name: Ayala
featured_crew.flavor: Ayala was forced to join the Voyager crew, where he now held the provisional rank of Lieutenant JG.

featured_crew.name: Jenkins
featured_crew.flavor: Captain Jenkins - she may look like Captain Janeway, but could anyone mistake the cruel, heartless villain of the Doctor's novel for the real deal?

action.name: Nice Speech. Now Decompile The Program.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Haron
rewards.flavor: Leader of the Kazon-Relora sect, Haron was killed when Maje Culluh beamed him into space.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

ship.name: Cardassian Galor Cruiser
ship.flavor: The "foot soldier" of the Cardassian Union, nimble and destructive. Features multiple phaser arrays.

ship.name: Warship Voyager
ship.flavor: According to the Kyrian Heritage, this warship commanded by the brutal Captain Janeway terrorized the Kyrian people with biogenic weapons.

ship.name: U.S.S. Voyager NCC-74656-J
ship.flavor: The 11th Intrepid-class starship with the name Voyager operated by Starfleet in the late 32nd century.

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.flavor: Ayala was forced to join the Voyager crew, where he now held the provisional rank of Lieutenant JG.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Ayala
rewards.flavor: Ayala was forced to join the Voyager crew, where he now held the provisional rank of Lieutenant JG.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

content.reroll_info:
Skirmish rewards are additive. By continuously rolling you receive additional rewards. No rewards are lost by rolling again.
DROP RATES:
Event VP: 13.58%
Time Portal Pack: 0.13%
Chronitons: 11.45%
Honor: 14.11%
Intel: 27.43%
Credits: 33.29%

screens.text: "We have had enough of this meddlesome nonsense. Your Voyager and her crew have been nothing but trouble since they trespassed upon our quadrant! Is this Prime Directive of yours serious or just for show?"
"Yes. We Ramurans want nothing other than to be left alone. And yet your Voyager's crew couldn't help but insert itself into our affairs. It's time for Voyager to go - every version of it!"
"You can certainly try to get rid of us. But this model is far better than the Vortex and your quadrant is ripe for the taking."

"I'll never forgive the Doctor for making such a poor likeness of me! But somehow, she and her cohorts managed to come into possession of the Voyager-J. And they seem hellbent on worsening tensions in the Delta Quadrant."
